email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, DWT 150,000, LOA 280m. The laycan is October 15-20. Starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to the low 50s? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can offer $51.25 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.25 is still a bit steep. Can we settle at $50.75? Also, can we confirm the laytime is 72 hours? Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can agree to $50.75 per metric ton. Laytime is confirmed at 72 hours. Please confirm your acceptance so we can proceed with the fixture. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, we accept the terms. Please send over the fixture recap. Thanks for your help. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, please find the fixture recap attached. Vessel: MV Ocean Star, DWT 150,000, LOA 280m. Laycan: October 15-20. Freight: $50.75 per metric ton. Demurrage: $15,000 per day, pro rata. Laytime: 72 hours. Let me know if you need any further details. Best, Sarah.
